long_description: Enjoy the light, crispy and flavorful Sahale Snacks Crunchers(TM) almond snack anytime you get a craving. Crunchers are all natural, gluten free and cholesterol free; contain no trans fat. Cherry Maple flavor combines roasted sliced almonds with naturally dried apples; mix is lightly glazed with maple, then finished with a touch of cinnamon. Cranberry Honey flavor combines roasted sliced almonds with dried cranberries and sesame seeds; mix is glazed with orange blossom honey and finished with ground vanilla bean. Parmesan Herb flavor combines roasted sliced almonds with grated Parmesan cheese and sun-dried tomatoes; mix is accented with an herb blend of oregano, thyme and basil. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Enjoy the light, crispy and flavorful Sahale Snacks Crunchers(TM) almond snack anytime you get a craving.
